Description.Text:
Position Modern structure managed directly from the owners is situated in Campora locality dipped S.Giovanni and in a green park. Distance from the sea: 150 mt. Beach: of sand.
Restaurant Restaurant with particularly cured kitchen with traditional service to the tables and chosen menu with specialty calabrians.
More Informations Services: hall, Internet point, piano bar, stay hall, TV hall, elevator, medical service, shuttle from/to the beach, external parking. Sport and leisure: semi-Olympic swimming pool with solarium, bowling, private beach with beach volleyball, archery, canoeing, windsurfing, tennis and soccer with payment.
